title: In 1st full year of pandemic, biggest metros lost residents - The Associated Press - en Español
content: In 1st full year of pandemic, biggest metros lost residents  The Associated Press - en EspañolView Full Coverage on Google News
description: After returning to metro San Francisco following a college football career, Anthony Giusti felt like his hometown was passing him by. The high cost of living, driven by a constantly transforming tech industry, ensured that even with two jobs he would never save enough money to buy a house.
